list.name: Default
list.comment: Updated pom.xml with full lst dependencies

task.summary: Added UserConroller, Post Controller to handle user interactions, jsp pages for CRUD users, posts

Added follow, stop follow links and UserSubscription controller. Added extended post search by phrase (case sensetive, like based). Added user search by login ( case sensetive, shoud be a full login). Added nohits page for search
Added pagination for user tweets and following tweets
Refactored Controllers according to CQRS (Command Query Responsibility Segregation). Added logger for controllers. Updated error jsp page. Assign errorPage fr page directive inside jsp templates

Refactored packages structure : separate core classes from rest, web MVC parts. Added config package with configurations of Core classes, WebMVC classes using annotations instead of xml declarations. Added WebAppInitializer classes instead web.xml
Added Login Interceptor in MvcConfig configuration for all urls Deleted unnecessary prints in console
Project migrated from xml configuration to Java Config

Changed architecture and web config to support REST architecture Added Jakson json converter to support entity responses in json format Added rest/UserQueriesController with ability to request all users in the system, get user by id, get user by login

Added follower, friend, home, search packages for RESTful services. Added FollowerQueriesController, FriendQueriesController, PostQueriesController, UserQueriesController, SearchQueriesController: controllers to dispaly all twitter entities: - list of followers - list of friends - friends posts - user posts - available post ( own + friends ones) - user account - list of users - search user by login - search post by phrase

Updated pom xml with jackson dependencies Fixed Jackson JsonHttpMessageConverter: - set up supported media types Added FriendCommandsController: - Method that provide ability to set subscription on user. Similar to "add to friend action" - Method that provide ability to unset subscription on user. Similar to "remove from friends action" Added PostCommandsController: - add tweet - delete tweet Added UserPostController: - delete user
Changed implementation of create methods in service, repository packages for Post and Users. Now methods return newly created ID ( Integer) in case of success and 0 in case of fail
Added updateTweet method in PostCommandsController: - ability to update user tweet with checks on modifying self tweets

Added addUser and updateUser in UserCommandsController: - add user with check on unique login, not empty password - update user with ability to update all fields except userId, login and non-empty password. Added check that user updates own profile
Added pagination for user tweets and tweets of specified user ( with specified id)
Updated pom.xml with full lst dependencies

Added updateTweet method in PostCommandsController: - ability to update user tweet with checks on modifying self tweets

Added addUser and updateUser in UserCommandsController: - add user with check on unique login, not empty password - update user with ability to update all fields except userId, login and non-empty password. Added check that user updates own profile
